item.title: Git and RSA identities
item.description: Here is the solution I found to be able to use git with a different RSA identity than the rsa_id default one. My repo on github is logback-android and my user account is espinielli. I did generate an SSH key as per github help and named it github_rsa: $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_email@youremail.com" -f github_rsa I then added the following section in ~/.ssh/config # github for espinielli Host github
